languages.text: {n}Они больше не слышат. Они больше не могут слышать. Дурман ослушания заполнил их головы.{/n}
{n}They hear me no more. They cannot, for the poison of disobedience has utterly filled their minds.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Они больше не слышат. Они больше не могут слышать. Дурман ослушания заполнил их головы.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}They hear me no more. They cannot hear me, for the poison of disobedience has filled their heads.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sie hören mich nicht mehr. Sie können es gar nicht, denn das Gift des Ungehorsams hat ihren Geist vollständig erfüllt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They hear me no more. They cannot, for the poison of disobedience has utterly filled their minds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sie hören mich nicht mehr. Sie können es gar nicht, denn das Gift des Ungehorsams hat ihren Geist vollständig erfüllt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ya no me oyen. No pueden, pues el veneno de la desobediencia ha inundado sus mentes por completo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They hear me no more. They cannot, for the poison of disobedience has utterly filled their minds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Ya no me oyen. No pueden, pues el veneno de la desobediencia ha inundado sus mentes por completo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}彼らに私の声はもう届かない。反抗という毒が心をむしばみ、話を聞くことができないのだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They hear me no more. They cannot, for the poison of disobedience has utterly filled their minds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}彼らに私の声はもう届かない。反抗という毒が心をむしばみ、話を聞くことができないのだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}他们没再聆听我的话语。他们已经听不到了，暴乱的毒液已经彻底填满了他们的头脑。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}They hear me no more. They cannot, for the poison of disobedience has utterly filled their minds.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}他们没再聆听我的话语。他们已经听不到了，暴乱的毒液已经彻底填满了他们的头脑。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ils ne m'écoutent plus. Ils ne le peuvent plus, car le poison de la désobéissance a complètement corrompu leurs esprits.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Beni artık duymuyorlar. Zihinleri itaatsizlik zehriyle baştan aşağı dolu olduğundan duymaları mümkün değil.{/n}
